DOC.brief_summary: Adipocytokines play an important role in joint inflammation in patients with knee osteoarthritis as measured by ultrasound and high sensitivity protein-C reactive. Adipocytokines could be the link between osteoarthritis and cardiovascular risk factors more prevalent in these patients.
DOC.criteria: Patients over 50 years old with symptomatic knee osteoarthritis. Patients with secondary osteoarthritis of the knee Any other rheumatologic condition.
